definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: mourning—´[[א]] Ge 37:35, Es 6:12; cstr. [[אֲבֶל־]] Ps 35:14; [[אֲבֵלִים]] Job 29:25 Is 61:2 etc.;—for dead Ge 37:35, calamity Es 6:12, cf. fig. La 1:4 (pred., inanim. subj.), elsewhere as subst. mourner; sg. Ps 35:14 (cstr.) for dead (‖[[קדר]]); pl. Job 29:25 abs.; for calamity Is 57:18, Is 61:2, Is 61:3 (where mourners for Zion, or of Zion, v. Di).
